context: Hello! HOw are you? I am ooking for some good comedies. Any ideas?
Hi I really liked The Other Woman (2014)
I don't think I have heard of that one,
Oh, it was hysterical - these gals all had been played by the same guy and they got together to teach him a lesson
I will check that out! I keep hearing that Bridesmaids (2011) is funny. Have you seen it?
Bridesmaids (2011) was very entertaining. I also enjoyed What About Bob%3F (1991)
OH my God! What About Bob%3F (1991) is one of my favorite Bill Murray movies! With his little fish !
Yeah! What About Bob%3F (1991) is a total classic.
ANy other Bill Murray films you would suggest?
resp: Caddyshack II (1988) is a popular one!

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific genre or type of movie?

I love emotional and thought-provoking drama, chilling horror, and intriguing mystery. I'm really looking forward to watching some new movies that cover those genres. Do you have any recommendations for me?
context.feelings: I'm excited to explore new cinematic worlds and experience emotional, thought-provoking drama, chilling horror, and intriguing mystery. I can't wait to see what the recommender suggests!

context.content: I recommend "Psycho" for a chilling horror and intriguing mystery experience.
That sounds interesting! Can you tell me more about "Psycho"?
context.feelings: I'm excited to explore "Psycho" and see if it covers the emotional and thought-provoking drama, chilling horror, and intriguing mystery that I love in movies. I hope it's as thrilling as it sounds!

context.content: "Psycho" is a classic psychological horror film directed by Alfred Hitchcock. It's known for its suspenseful storyline and iconic shower scene. It's definitely a must-see for fans of chilling horror and intriguing mystery.

Wow, "Psycho" sounds really intriguing! I love the idea of a psychological horror film with a suspenseful storyline. I can't wait to watch it and experience the chilling horror and mystery. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited to watch "Psycho" because it seems to cover the chilling horror and intriguing mystery genres that I love. The recommender did a great job explaining the movie and making it sound really interesting. I can't wait to experience the suspenseful storyline and see how it all unfolds.
